cluster_classes.class_description: Behaviors of caterpillars related to consuming plant leaves as their primary nutritional activity.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Caterpillars feeding on plant leaves as their main activity and food source.

members.entity_description: Primary caterpillar activity of consuming plant leaves for nutrition.
Plant leaves that serve as sites for egg-laying, feeding by caterpillars, and attachment for chrysalis formation.

splits.name: Caterpillar Plant-Leaf Substrate
splits.description: Plant leaves serving as physical substrate for caterpillar egg-laying, feeding, and chrysalis attachment.

args.justification: The original class mixes a behavior entity ('feeding on leaves') with an environmental/location entity ('plant leaves'); splitting separates behavior from physical substrate.

args.new_description: Behaviors of caterpillars specifically related to consuming plant leaves as a primary food source.
args.justification: After removing the substrate entity, the remaining entity is purely behavioral; updating the name/description clarifies scope and assigns an appropriate shared Class_Group.

args.new_description: Plant leaves considered as physical structures used by caterpillars for egg-laying, feeding sites, and chrysalis attachment.
args.justification: The new split class is environmental rather than behavioral; setting a clear name, description, type hint, and aligning its Class_Group with the related behavior class makes the schema coherent.

executed_decisions.justification: The original class mixes a behavior entity ('feeding on leaves') with an environmental/location entity ('plant leaves'); splitting separates behavior from physical substrate.

executed_decisions.new_description: Behaviors of caterpillars specifically related to consuming plant leaves as a primary food source.
executed_decisions.justification: After removing the substrate entity, the remaining entity is purely behavioral; updating the name/description clarifies scope and assigns an appropriate shared Class_Group.

executed_decisions.new_description: Plant leaves considered as physical structures used by caterpillars for egg-laying, feeding sites, and chrysalis attachment.
executed_decisions.justification: The new split class is environmental rather than behavioral; setting a clear name, description, type hint, and aligning its Class_Group with the related behavior class makes the schema coherent.
